snippet: Embezzlement charges against Aleksei Navalny are the Kremlin’s most direct measure to date against a leader of the Russian protest movement that erupted in December.
abstract: Russian investigators charge blogger and anticorruption activist Aleksei Navalny with embezzlement; if case progresses to an arrest or a sentence, it will signal a shift in strategy by Pres Vladimir V Putin, who has mainly refrained from criminal prosecutions of activist leaders in his 12 years in power.
lead_paragraph: Embezzlement charges against Aleksei Navalny are the Kremlin’s most direct measure to date against a leader of the Russian protest movement that erupted in December.

headline.seo: Russian Activist Aleksei Navalny Charged With Embezzlement
headline.main: Russia Charges Anticorruption Activist in Plan to Steal Timber
headline.print_headline: Russia Charges Anticorruption Activist With Embezzlement in Plan to Steal Timber
